parameter-group.name: Settings
parameter-group.label: Polling
parameter-group.description: Settings required to optimize the polling behaviour.

parameter.name: polling-period-poweroff-seconds
parameter.label: Polling period in seconds when the device is off
parameter.description: Seconds to wait to the next polling when device is off. Useful to save up i/o and cpu when your device is not working. If you use only this binding to control the device, you can put higher values here.

parameter.name: polling-period-poweron-seconds
parameter.label: Polling period in seconds for Device States when device is on
parameter.description: Seconds to wait to the next polling for device state (dashboard channels)
